text_block_list.name: Young Woman
text_block_list.text: Helios! You brought an unfamiliar face with ya today. Friend?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yep! Name's Trai-pi. We tight～☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ever since our eyes met! Even our breathing's in sync☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh! It's here, it's here～～!! I really like this song!! Let's dance!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Like this. Ride the rhythm～…… Just move with it! And flow!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Just dance like boom boom♪ is what I'm saying! If that's too hard, just match me! If you don't it'll be a real bummer～
If I ruin the mood, then there's a chance I won't get to talk to her. Besides, when in Rome……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hyuuu, that's the spirit～☆ Trai-pi livin' it up, lookin' good☆ Team Heli-T is gonna tear it up!!
And so, I got caught up in Daitaku Helios' antics…… No, maybe I was drawn in like a moth to the flame―

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text: ―So, about the next "Fireside-chat Party"! The association chairman suggested a potluck picnic!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Sounds awesome～! When I cook I always end up burning everything! If ya need something bitter, leave it to me!☆

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text: Ufufuu, a little charring makes it spicy! ……or something! Ever since Helios-chan started joining in, it's been more fun.

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text: Cooperation between other associations has been going smoothly too. The picnic too, sounds like there's going to be a lot of people!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hyuuu～♪ Instead of a park maybe we need a dome!? A Fireside-chat picnic in a dome sounds wild☆

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: True that☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―And then, you line up some vinyl pools! Don't you wanna make a beach for Gramps and Granny!? Count me in!

text_block_list.name: Old Man
text_block_list.text: Fufu, that sounds fun. Seems like Summer will be coming for even an old man like me.

text_block_list.name: Small Child
text_block_list.text: Helios-chan, I wanna help too! I'll get the other kids from my school too～ ehehe♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: We～i, everyone's welcome☆ The entire world is my friend-!
The smiles just seemed to gather around Daitaku Helios. It must have been because she, herself, was always smiling…… from the bottom of her heart―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ah～ Good times, good times☆ Today was extra lit!
After spending the day with her, I felt I understood her a little better. An endless well of brightness, a girl that drew everyone to her like the Sun. But, still……
A girl that enjoyed life this much, why would she choose Tracen Academy…… there had to be a big reason for it hidden somewhere.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Alright, on to the last event! Time for a race～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―Yooooo. Right, let's get started～☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: The heck's that!? Sounds rough～ hilarious!!
choice_data_list: Didn't you run a mock race yesterday?
Didn't you run a mock race yesterday?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Well, the day ain't over 'til I've run. Gotta wrap it all up with the most fun thing of all, right!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: 'Course! Today was an absolute blast though～, but nothin' beats a race☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: 'Cuz I can hit it with everything? And it really gets the blood pumpin'!? It's wicked how all those emotions clash!! And it feels great～☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Wait…… that's wild! You don't know how awesome races are? Eh, that has to be it, otherwise normally you wouldn't ask that, right!?

text_block_list.name: Helios' Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Heeey, everyone's ready-. Helios, you need to Gate In too～.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ……guess there's no helping it☆ Hey～! I'm gonna run carrying this person!

text_block_list.name: Helios' Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Haaaa～～～!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hyuu～～～～!! Blast off――――!!
The race started with Daitaku Helios forcibly carrying me! She ran at top speed right from the start―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa!! It ain't scary! Feel it with your whole body! It's theeeeeee beeeeeeeest～～～～!!!!
Urged on by her words, I steeled myself and then opened my eyes. When I did…… the wind, breath, footsteps, the beating in my chest…… hit me all at once―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Weeeee～～～～～i!!!! Wild, right!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Is there anything as awesome as this!? I love racing! I'm really down bad～～☆
It's not that she's indifferent to winning or losing. It's just that, from the bottom of her heart, she just loves running…… and races themselves. What a free spirit―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―And so, I'm last again!? Ain't that too tragic!?
choice_data_list: I mean, you were carrying a person……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ain't that the truth☆ But it was still lit!! See, racing's the best, right!?
Honestly, for most of it I was clinging for dear life, so I wouldn't call that fun but…… I now understood her feelings. And also my own……
For that girl who shone like the sun, and was as free as could be, I wanted to cheer her on. Once you stripped away everything else, only that simple feeling remained.
―But that's exactly why it was such a waste. "It's fun whether I win or lose," this stance was one that…… didn't understand the joy of winning.
choice_data_list: (For her, it'll be even more fun)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hey, let's go again! This time without carrying someone! Hey, sounds great, right!?

text_block_list.name: Helios' Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Eh～!? No way! Besides, normally it's not something you can do multiple days in a row!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Then, Trai-pi! I choose you! Use Parallel Running!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: The race was awesome, right!? Then, this time use your own two feet～ and battle it out with me～☆ Gate In, wei!
